titles.title: Expressing support for designation of April as "Organ Donation Awareness/Donate Life Month".
Expressing support for designation of April as "Organ Donation Awareness/Donate Life Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of Organ Donation Awareness/Donate Life Month.
